mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, salt, phone, email, gender, avatar, is_delete,role, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{avatar}, #{isDelete}, #{role},#{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime})
mapper.select: select user_id,username,password,salt,phone,email,gender,avatar,is_delete,role,created_user,created_time,modified_user,modified_time from users where username = #{username} and (is_delete=0 or is_delete is null)

select user_id,username,password,salt,phone,email,gender,avatar,is_delete,role,created_user,created_time,modified_user,modified_time from users where user_id=#{userId} and (is_delete=0 or is_delete is null)
mapper.update: update users set phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, gender = #{gender}, modified_user = #{modifiedUser}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime} where user_id=#{userId}
